lead_paragraph: John Danks and the Chicago White Sox breezed through a 10-2 victory against the San Diego Padres in 2 hours, 46 minutes Saturday, and then headed to Oakland for the season opener on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Danks, White Sox Ready for Season After 10-2 Win vs Padres
headline.main: Danks, White Sox Ready for Season After 10-2 Win vs Padres

snippet: John Danks and the Chicago White Sox breezed through a 10-2 victory against the San Diego Padres in 2 hours, 46 minutes Saturday, and then headed to Oakland for the season opener on Monday night....
